projects.name: Online Restaurant Booking System
projects.desc:
I have Developed this beautiful website to be helpful for both end-user and the owner. This project is basically designed for a Restaurant by keeping all the website requirements of a Restaurant (Hotel Nandanvan) located at Sangliwadi on Sangli-Islampur Highway owned by Mr. Adarsh Yadav. This was my first hands-on project Developed during Final-Year of BCS Degree. This project has been very helpful for me, it let me acquire knowledge for the Project Development Phases.
This Project is built using Html, Css, Javascript for the frontend and My-SQL and Java for the Backend.

It is a robust system for booking and ordering food, enabling users to check restaurant availability, book tables and conference halls, and order from the displayed menu. • Implemented secure authentication methods to ensure data integrity and privacy, utilizing password authentication for various user logins. • Focused on continuous optimization to enhance user experience and streamline data management processes. • Utilized user interface design, database management, and API integration skills to deliver a seamless and efficient platform.

projects.name: Assistant Chatbot
projects.desc:
I have worked on this website in a team and this chatbot was developed by keeping the chat-gpt and google gemini in focus. This project is designed similar to the Google's Gemini by studying all the website requirements for a chatbot. This hands-on project was Developed during First-Year of MCA Degree. This was a mini project and needed to be developed with less time span. This project has been very helpful for me, it let me acquire knowledge for the Project Development Phases.
This Project is built using Html, Css, Javascript, and Php.

We have used Google Gemini's free to use API to generate responses to the Queries. • Developed a chatbot as part of a team during a mini-project using the open-source Google Gemini API to generate accurate and context-aware responses to user queries. • Responsible for gathering requirements, and information, and managing comprehensive documentation. • Conducted testing in diverse environments to ensure seamless interaction and reliable performance. • Collaborated on development tasks, demonstrating strong teamwork and technical proficiency in natural language processing.

projects.name: Green Groccers System
projects.desc:
Green Groccers is a comprehensive e-commerce platform designed to bridge the gap between vegetable vendors and consumers. By leveraging the power of technology, we aim to create a seamless online marketplace where customers can conveniently purchase fresh produce directly from local vendors. This project was Developed during vacations of BCS Degree as a part of practice. This project has been very helpful for me, it let me acquire knowledge for the Project Development Phases.
This Project is built using Html, Css, Javascript for the frontend and My-SQL and Java for the Backend.

It is a robust system for booking and ordering food, enabling users to check restaurant availability, book tables and conference halls, and order from the displayed menu. • Implemented secure authentication methods to ensure data integrity and privacy, utilizing password authentication for various user logins. • Focused on continuous optimization to enhance user experience and streamline data management processes. • With a focus on quality, freshness, and convenience, Green Grocers empowers vendors to expand their reach and increase sales, while offering customers a wide selection of locally sourced produce at their fingertips.
